channel.title: Screen bugs
channel.description:
Hello everybody,
I have some strange static screen bugs like this: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96851934[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96851789[/url]
All graphics settings are recomended (marked *). Using: * enlish version of Windows XP SP3 x86 * old graphic card GeForce FX5200 with the last version of driver, that supports it. * the latest updates of directX 9.0c (June, 2010).
Anyway, another source game working good.
Can I fix it?

item.title: Screen bugs
item.dc:creator: gnrslash95
item.description:
No problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Screen bugs
item.dc:creator: zuxla
item.description:
gnrslash95, thanks a lot!
I have turned off HUD and line went away.

It’s no problem too see some crashed FXs and textures because of my old videocard, but this line is killing me

Read full topic

item.title: Screen bugs
item.dc:creator: gnrslash95
item.description:
It happened to me at the beginning of the game. I when into in-game option -> black mesa-> turned off HUD. Then the line went away.
Issue is though, when i get damaged by toxic water, it reappears. However i noticed that it disappears automatically whenever i passed the checkpoint.

Read full topic

item.title: Screen bugs
item.dc:creator: zuxla
item.description:
Shows as DirectX 9.0 in advanced graphic settings.

I have launched with -dxlevel 90 command. Now there are no line, but the game proces turns to slideshow

Please notice: another Source games as HL2, TF, Synergy are working well and I have never seen that diagonal line. But I have seen some crashed textures and shows as magenta grid. Does it means, that some graphic abilities are turned off or I have damaged installed game?

Anyway, thanks for trying me to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Screen bugs
item.dc:creator: metalmunki
item.description:
Regardless of how updated your drivers/directx is, that is a very old card (2003). You’ve probably just reached the limits of what it’s capable of. Aside from turning off some graphics options in the game to try and improve it, you are probably out of luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Screen bugs
item.dc:creator: zuxla
item.description:
Hello everybody,

I have some strange static screen bugs like this:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96851934
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96851789

All graphics settings are recomended (marked *). Using:

  • enlish version of Windows XP SP3 x86
  • old graphic card GeForce FX5200 with the last version of driver, that supports it.
  • the latest updates of directX 9.0c (June, 2010).

Anyway, another source game working good.

Can I fix it?

Read full topic
